document.full_text: texas governor rick perry has criticized the obama administration for denying a request for a major disaster declaration, but the federal emergency management agency says texas did not show a need for the move.
document.title: texas governor, feds tangle over disaster declaration
lines_and_colors: texas governor rick perry has criticized the obama administration for denying a request for a major disaster declaration, but the federal emergency management agency says texas did not show a need for the move.
